name: build-production
instructions:
Creates an optimized production build of the application in the dist/ directory.

The build process:
1. Runs TypeScript type checking
2. Bundles and minifies JavaScript/CSS
3. Optimizes assets and images
4. Generates source maps

Output:
- dist/ directory with all static files
- Optimized for performance and small bundle size

To test the production build:
1. Run: npm run preview
2. Open http://localhost:4173

To deploy:
- Serve the dist/ directory with any static file server
- Or use: npx serve dist
